page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: The oldest building in the area is{ {MELLOR CHURCH,}but there are many other churches and chapels in the district.{Mellor, All Saints' and St. {Martins}are all Church of England.{ {St.Mary's}is Roman Catholic, and there are several Methodist churches also. A{Survey}was undertaken to discover the religious attitudes and beliefs of the parents of the school-children in the area. 36% attend church regularly 44% attend church sometimes 20% never attend church. Approx. 25% of those who do not attend church still hold some religious beliefs. Of those who attend, approx. 35% send their children to Sunday School or Junior Church. Attendance at church is now on the increase after some years of decline.
